images.image_prompt: A bird slowly opening its wings to a fully spread position
The goat walks to the opposite side of the cat positioning itself to the right of it
An egg cracks open, revealing its inner contents
An apocalypse is near as nature reclaims the road, with vegetation breaking through cracks and abandoned vehicles weathering away.
A zebra's black and white stripes gradually fade, transforming it into the solid-colored horse.
A 1940s car enters the scene as the current car speeds up and exits.
Black stripes gradually appear on the horse's white coat, transforming it into a zebra pattern.
The flowers are gently lifted from the glass pitcher. The glass pitcher is replaced with a flower pot, and the flowers are placed inside.
The cat gradually turns its head, then its body, until it fully faces away, showing only its back to the camera.
The bear pauses, then rises onto its hind legs, shifting into a standing position.
The horse bends its legs, gathers energy, and then leaps into the air.
The dogs turn to face each other, baring their teeth and growling in anger.
A lit cigar is placed in the dog's mouth, with smoke appearing as if the dog is smoking.
The teddy bear gently uses its feet to rise into a standing position.
The giraffe gracefully lowers itself to the ground, tucking its legs beneath its body until it's fully seated.
A child aggressively tears up the teddy bear, leaving it damaged and discarded.
The snow gradually melts and reveals a lush grass field
The classic car slowly transforms into a race car
Someone gently places a hat on top of the cat's bare head
A person slowly lifts their hands and claps them together
The elphant enters a vivid circus setting
The goat slowly approaches the cat and jumps over it
